markdown: HERMAN E. TALMADGE, GA., CHAIRMAN JAMES O. EASTLAND, MISS. GEORGE MC GOVERN, S. DAK. JAMES B. ALLEN, ALA. HUBERT H. HUMPHREY, MINN. WALTER D. HUDDLESTON, KY. DICK CLARK, IOWA RICHARD B. STONE, FLA. PATRICK J. LEAHY, VT. EDWARD ZORINSKY, NEBR. JOHN MELCHER, MONT. ROBERT DOL, KANS. MILTON R. YOUNG, N. DAK. CARL T. CURTIS, NEBR. HENRY BELLMON, OKLA. JESSE HELMS, N.C. S. I. HAYAKAWA, CALIF. RICHARD G. LUGAR, IND. United States Senate COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE, NUTRITION, AND FORESTRY WASHINGTON, D.C. 20510 MICHAEL R. MC LEOD GENERAL COUNSEL AND STAFF DIRECTOR June 3, 1977 Dear Jim: Thank you for your note. I met with Nutrition Committee staff members recently regarding the visit I had with you and Bill Tatem. I assure you that the Committee staff is at work on the matter now and you will be hearing from me shortly. With kind personal regards, I am <::attestation: Signature Signed Signature: illegible Sincerely, George McGovern This is a black ink signature positioned below the typed word "Sincerely," and above the typed name "George McGovern" in the center of the image.::> James Rowe Corcoran, Youngman and Rowe 1511 K Street, N. W. Washington, D. C. 20005 <::attestation: [Official Stamp] [Status: Received, Stamped] [Signature: illegible] RECEIVED JUN 6 1977 THE SUGAR ASSOCIATION, INC. A rectangular stamp with "RECEIVED" at the top, a date "JUN 6 1977" below it, and "THE SUGAR ASSOCIATION, INC." at the bottom. There is a faint, illegible mark on the left side, partially overlapping "JUN".::> Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/rslk0226

chunks.markdown: HERMAN E. TALMADGE, GA., CHAIRMAN JAMES O. EASTLAND, MISS. GEORGE MC GOVERN, S. DAK. JAMES B. ALLEN, ALA. HUBERT H. HUMPHREY, MINN. WALTER D. HUDDLESTON, KY. DICK CLARK, IOWA RICHARD B. STONE, FLA. PATRICK J. LEAHY, VT. EDWARD ZORINSKY, NEBR. JOHN MELCHER, MONT. ROBERT DOL, KANS. MILTON R. YOUNG, N. DAK. CARL T. CURTIS, NEBR. HENRY BELLMON, OKLA. JESSE HELMS, N.C. S. I. HAYAKAWA, CALIF. RICHARD G. LUGAR, IND.
United States Senate COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE, NUTRITION, AND FORESTRY WASHINGTON, D.C. 20510
MICHAEL R. MC LEOD GENERAL COUNSEL AND STAFF DIRECTOR

Dear Jim: Thank you for your note. I met with Nutrition Committee staff members recently regarding the visit I had with you and Bill Tatem. I assure you that the Committee staff is at work on the matter now and you will be hearing from me shortly.
With kind personal regards, I am

<::attestation: Signature Signed Signature: illegible Sincerely, George McGovern This is a black ink signature positioned below the typed word "Sincerely," and above the typed name "George McGovern" in the center of the image.::>
James Rowe Corcoran, Youngman and Rowe 1511 K Street, N. W. Washington, D. C. 20005

<::attestation: [Official Stamp] [Status: Received, Stamped] [Signature: illegible] RECEIVED JUN 6 1977 THE SUGAR ASSOCIATION, INC. A rectangular stamp with "RECEIVED" at the top, a date "JUN 6 1977" below it, and "THE SUGAR ASSOCIATION, INC." at the bottom. There is a faint, illegible mark on the left side, partially overlapping "JUN".::>
